author: jshlee
body:
#### PR description:

* Updating gem dataformat to v301 as documented in https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1iKMl68vMsSWgr8ekVdsJYTk7-Pgy8paxq98xj6GtoVo/edit#gid=929454128
* more HW status bits added, mainly to unused bits
* added initialisers for constructors 

#### PR validation:

* runTheMatrix ran ok
* no changes for gem
title: GEM vfat dataformat update v301
